refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Add a path prefix to each HTML img or FO fo:external-graphics element's src attribute. This path could relative to the directory where the HTML/FO files are created, or it could be an absolute URI. The default value is empty. Be sure to include a trailing slash if needed.
This prefix is not applied to any filerefs that start with "/" or contain "//:".
